Room.Name: Lorian Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lorian Parkway, east of Ivan's Leather Armory.
Room.LongDescription: Leather is perhaps one of the most versitile materials in the world, being used for everything from armor to shoes to weapons. Ivan carries just about anything you could want. On the west side of the road is the Evenborough Inn, a popular overnight stop for weary travellers.
